TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SectionInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy.

span.span: Contains metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 物件包含在組態階層架構內的個別區段有關的中繼資料。The object contains the metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy. 此物件可用來驗證及變更個別區段的屬性。This object can be used in order to validate and change the properties of an individual section. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得相關聯的中繼資料物件。The following example shows how to get the metadata that is associated with a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`false`，則屬性會指出區段供原生程式碼的讀取器。When set to `false`, the property indicates that the section is accessed by native-code readers. 因此，使用`location`不允許屬性，因為原生程式碼讀取器不支援的概念`location`。Therefore, the use of the `location` attribute is not allowed, because the native-code readers do not support the concept of `location`. ## Examples 在本節中的範例示範如何取得之後存取相關的區段資訊的組態檔中的屬性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下列範例會取得物件。The following example gets the object. summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the include file in which the associated configuration section is defined, if such a file exists.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the include file in which the associated configuration section is defined, if such a file exists.

value.span: 所在的 include 檔的名稱相關聯定義，如果存在這類檔案，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The name of the include file in which the associated is defined, if such a file exists; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的值`configSource`屬性指定相關聯的物件物件。The property represents the value of the `configSource` attribute that is specified for a object that is associated with the object. A實作可以選擇性地指定個別的檔案，其中定義該區段的組態設定。A implementation can optionally specify a separate file in which the configuration settings for that section are defined. 這可能是以多種方式很有用：This can be useful in multiple ways: - 使用 include 檔可以產生更具邏輯和模組化結構的組態檔。Using include files can result in a more logical and modular structure for configuration files. - 檔案存取安全性和權限可用來限制存取區段的組態設定。File-access security and permissions can be used to restrict access to sections of configuration settings. - 可以修改並重新載入而不需要重新啟動應用程式的 include 檔案中不會在應用程式初始化期間使用的設定。Settings in an include file that are not used during application initialization can be modified and reloaded without requiring an application restart. 下列範例示範如何這個屬性使用組態檔中指定`pages`區段定義在外部的 include 檔：The following example shows how this attribute is used in a configuration file to specify that the `pages` section is defined in an external include file: `` 如果設定中設定的任何包含檔案需要重新啟動時加以修改，應用程式設定屬性設`true`。If any of the settings in a configuration include file require the application to restart when they are modified, set the property to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 應用程式，會在執行的階段您可以指派給屬性的替代的設定檔的名稱。In ASP.NET applications, at run time you can assign to the property the name of an alternative configuration file. 在此情況下，檔案的內容會覆寫 Web.config 檔案中包含的預設連接字串資訊。In that case, the contents of the file are overwritten by the default connection string information that is contained in the Web.config file. 發生這種情況也時替代的檔案不存在，因此它會建立在執行階段。This occurs also when the alternative file does not exist and it is created at run time. 如果 Web.config 檔案不包含任何連接字串資訊，空的區段會新增至替代的檔案中。If the Web.config file does not contain any connection string information, an empty section is added to the alternative file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfigurationBuilder As ConfigurationBuilder

summary.span: Gets the object for this configuration section.

span.span: Gets the object for this configuration section.

value.span: 此設定區段的 物件。

span.span: The object for this configuration section.

summary.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態區段不會寫入組態檔中，當它繼承自父檔案。A configuration section is not written in a configuration file when it is inherited from a parent file. 如果您想以顯示子組態檔中的 [父] 區段，您必須設定至`true`。If you want the parent section to show in the child configuration file, you must set the to `true`. 這樣的組態檔的可攜性從一部電腦之間。This makes a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 這也可讓您確保區段的存在，即使您沒有父組態檔控制。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration() cil managed

summary.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會強制此宣告，以寫入組態檔。The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以強制寫入組態檔，即使部分不需要，因為它已經宣告為父檔案中的宣告。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if the section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以讓檔案更容易移植從一部電腦到另一個組態。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 它可讓您確保區段存在甚至是當您沒有父組態檔控制。It enables you to make sure that the section exists even when you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool force) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool require) cil managed

summary.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file, or removes an existing section from the configuration file.

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file, or removes an existing section from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會強制這寫入至組態檔，如果宣告`force`是`true`。The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force`已`false`，如果此動作可能會遭到忽略宣告由系統所需。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the declaration is required by the system. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以強制寫入組態檔，即使此區段不需要，因為它已經宣告為父檔案中的宣告。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if this section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以讓檔案更容易移植從一部電腦到另一個組態。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 這也可讓您確保區段的存在，即使您沒有父組態檔控制。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#113)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#113)]

exception.span: is and the associated section cannot be exported to the child configuration file, or it is undeclared.

span.span: is and the associated section cannot be exported to the child configuration file, or it is undeclared.

If the configuration file is saved (even if there are no modifications), ASP.NET restarts the application.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the settings that are specified in the associated configuration section are inherited by applications that reside in a subdirectory of the relevant application.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the settings that are specified in the associated configuration section are inherited by applications that reside in a subdirectory of the relevant application.

value.span: 如果在此指定的設定物件會繼承由子應用程式; 否則。

span.span: if the settings specified in this object are inherited by child applications; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表`inheritInChildApplications`屬性`location`組態檔中的項目。The property represents the `inheritInChildApplications` attribute of a `location` element in a configuration file. 設定至`false`以防止特定設定的特定位置 （例如網站的根目錄） 子目錄中存在的應用程式所繼承。Set to `false` to prevent settings that are specific to a certain location (such as the root directory of a Web site) from being inherited by applications that exist in subdirectories. 下列範例示範如何使用組態檔中的這個屬性來指定網站的根目錄位置項目中所定義的設定無法被繼承子應用程式：The following example shows how to use this attribute in a configuration file to specify that the settings defined in the location element for the root of a Web site should not be inherited by child applications: `` 屬性適用於僅為位置特定的組態設定。The property applies only to location-specific configuration settings. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得的值物件。The following example shows how to get the value of a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`相關的區段時已被鎖定或屬性。The property returns `true` when the related section is locked by the or the property. 如果無法覆寫或目前的組態檔中定義，被鎖定的區段。A section is locked if it cannot be overridden or defined in the current configuration file. ## Examples 在本節中的範例示範如何取得之後存取相關的區段資訊的組態檔中的屬性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下列範例會取得物件。The following example gets the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#102)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#102)] 下列範例會取得值。The following example gets the value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 受保護的組態區段會加密，且為唯讀狀態。Protected configuration sections are encrypted and read-only. 如需有關受保護的組態區段的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 組態加密組態資訊使用受保護的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 在本節中的範例示範如何取得之後存取相關的區段資訊的組態檔中的屬性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下列範例會取得物件。The following example gets the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#102)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#102)] 下列範例會取得值。The following example gets the value. span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value that specifies whether the associated configuration section can be overridden by child configuration files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定值，這個值，指出資源是否宣告內`location`子組態檔會覆寫項目。The property gets or sets a value that indicates whether resources declared inside a `location` element can be overridden by child configuration files. 屬性會取得或設定值，這個值指定類似的行為，但這麼做的特定組態項目或群組，並使用其中一種列舉值。The property gets or sets a value that specifies similar behavior, but does so for a specific configuration element or group, and uses one of the enumeration values. 屬性可讓從父元素繼承行為。The property enables behavior to be inherited from a parent element. 您不能以程式設計方式設定這兩和屬性。You cannot programmatically set both the and property. 設定屬性，以`true`設定屬性設。Setting the property to `true` sets the property to . 設定屬性，以`false`設定屬性設`false`。Setting the property to `false` sets the property to `false`.

exception.span: An attempt was made to change both the and properties, which is not supported for compatibility reasons.

span.span: An attempt was made to change both the and properties, which is not supported for compatibility reasons.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string protectionProvider) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string provider) cil managed

summary.span: Marks a configuration section for protection.

span.span: Marks a configuration section for protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會標記的區段進行加密，因此會以加密形式中寫入磁碟上。The method marks the section for encryption so it will be written in encrypted form on disk. 依預設，會包含下列保護提供者：The following protection providers are included by default: > [!NOTE] > 如果您呼叫方法`null`參數或空字串，類別可當做保護提供者。If you call the method with a `null` parameter or an empty string, the class is used as the protection provider. 如需有關受保護的組態區段的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 組態加密組態資訊使用受保護的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#94)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#94)]

span.span: The property is set to .

exception.span: \- or - The target section is already a protected data section.

span.span: \- or - The target section is already a protected data section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequirePermission { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RequirePermission : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated configuration section requires access permissions.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated configuration section requires access permissions.

value.span: 如果屬性設定為; 否則。

span.span: if the attribute is set to ; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`，則`GetSection`方法會受到應用程式的信任層級設定。When is set to `true`, the `GetSection` methods are restricted by the trust level setting of the application. 這表示方法或屬性可讓您存取組態區段處理常式會受到 Web 應用程式設定的信任層級。This means that methods or properties that allow access to configuration section handlers are restricted by the trust level set for the Web application. > [!NOTE] > 由於高和完全信任層級可讓您存取目前的應用程式定義域以外的檔案，應用程式組態區段處理常式只能在使用這些信任層級。Because high and full trust are the only levels that allow access to files outside the current application domain, an application can use configuration section handlers only at these trust levels. 當設為`false`，組態資料的存取不會限制應用程式的信任層級設定。When is set to `false`, the access to the configuration data is not restricted by the application's trust level settings. > [!NOTE] > 適當的檔案 ACL （存取控制清單） 權限是否仍需要，不論設定。The appropriate file ACL (Access Control List) permissions are still required, regardless of the setting. ACL 權限會決定誰可以存取組態檔。ACL permissions determine who can access the configuration file. ## Examples 下列範例示範 Web 應用程式的兩個可能的信任層級時的屬性`appSettings`一節是`true`。The following example shows two possible trust levels for a Web application when the property of the `appSettings` section is `true`. ``` // With the following trust value // the code below works. // With the following trust value // the code below does not work. ``` 下列範例示範執行時沒有錯誤時設定的信任層級的程式碼設為 full。The following example shows code that runs without errors when the trust level is set to full. 否則，程式碼會產生錯誤。Otherwise, the code results in an error. ```csharp AppSettingsSection apSection = ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings") as AppSettingsSection; NameValueCollection apSectionCollection = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings; ``` ```vb Dim apSection As AppSettingsSection = _ TryCast(ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings"), AppSettingsSection) Dim apSectionCollection As NameValueCollection = _ ConfigurationManager.AppSettings ```
